situation: F expressed reluctance to leave the comfort of his library spot to attend science experiments in another room.
action: The teacher created a tactile map to help F visualize and prepare for the transition path to the science room. He was also paired with a peer who regularly navigated class changes alongside him.
effect: The tactile map enhanced F's understanding of the environment, building confidence in moving spaces. Peer support further encouraged him, making the transition less intimidating and more inclusive.
topic: Transition Difficulties - Moving between different activities or spaces
